snippet: Since the financial crisis, the investment bank has faced a wave of criticism from politicians, regulators, protesters and writers. Now, a Goldman executive who resigned publicly on Wednesday is joining the chorus of detractors.
abstract: Since the financial crisis, the investment bank has faced a wave of criticism from politicians, regulators, protesters and writers. Now, a Goldman executive who resigned publicly on Wednesday is joining the chorus of detractors.

headline.main: Interactive Feature: A Chorus of Criticism for Goldman
